title: Update regarding Velocity
story_body:
VELO, a leading developer of high-performance interconnect solutions, has announced a series of personnel updates within its engineering and marketing teams. 

Dr. Lisa Nguyen, a veteran engineer with expertise in signal integrity and high-speed design, has been promoted to Principal Engineer, effective immediately. In her new role, Dr. Nguyen will oversee the development of VELO's next-generation SerDes IP, focusing on optimizing performance and power efficiency for emerging applications in 5G, AI, and cloud computing.

On the marketing front, VELO has appointed Ms. Rachel Patel as its new Senior Marketing Manager. Ms. Patel brings over a decade of experience in technical marketing, having previously worked with leading semiconductor companies. She will be responsible for developing and executing VELO's global marketing strategy, with a focus on highlighting the company's technical differentiators and thought leadership in the high-speed interconnect space.

In related news, VELO has released its annual Sustainability Report, detailing the company's progress on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives. Key highlights include a 25% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from its operations, achieved through the implementation of energy-efficient lighting and HVAC systems at its headquarters. VELO has also expanded its diversity and inclusion programs, with a focus on increasing representation of underrepresented groups in its workforce.

VELO's Sustainability Report is available for download on the company's website. The report provides a comprehensive overview of VELO's ESG performance, as well as its goals and strategies for continued improvement in these areas.
